summary:
This mod makes every npc have different armour in the game and its epic
sick of seeing people have the same armour all the time this mod is for you every npc in the game has different armour  look at pictures
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes every npc have different armour in the game and its epic

This mod allows you to fight any one with random armour in the game any type of armour that is put in the game but not armour mod that people have made

this is just a fun mod if you want to go around killing everyone you can have cooler battles 

sick of seeing people have the same armour all the time this mod is for you every npc in the game has different armour  look at pictures 

[NOTE] you may have to start a new game for the npc\'s to have different armour on because when
there first born into skyrim they will have the same armour on even if you put this mod on 

Armor Multiplicity

Credits
ramakgaming
for the name of mod

enjoy

want to help post some of your picture\'s on here
